description.lang: Z-Wave Door/Window sensors are designed to secure the perimeter of the residential premise, and provide the ability to add various automation services. The Z-Wave Door/Window sensor, which consists of a magnet that attaches to a door or window, will communicate door events to the home security system. When the magnet is moved away from the sensor, a signal will be sent to the control panel that communicates the changed state to the security system. Signals can also be used to activate a chime or convenience lighting based on system settings.
Battery Report; Notification Report; Device Reset Locally Notification; Sensor Binary Report.
